name: Sword of Destiny Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who applies to be Michael's assistant?
questions.explanation:
Tobias.

	After pretending to be the British nanny, Mrs. Featherbottom, Tobias decided to get a job at the office as Michael's new assistant.  Michael's current secretary, Starla, is nervous that her job may be in Jeopardy, but she is only performing her jobs less because she's getting rabies shots.  She was bit by Quincy Jones' guard dog.

questions.text: Who buys the Sword of Destiny?
questions.explanation:
Gob.

	After Lindsay suggests that Gob go to an ancient Chinese medical center, Gob heads over and decides to buy an ancient sword with his purpose.  He intends to use the sword in a magic act where Michael stabs him in the stomach.  Michael is less than thrilled with the idea and leaves to teach George Michael how to drive.

questions.text: What does George Sr. wear on his head in the attic?
questions.explanation:
A towel.

	George Sr. wears the headband so that he doesn't injure himself by hitting the wooden beams on the roof.  George Sr. makes a video tape for the Bluth Company to show that he's in power, but Michael says that he won't play it.  Meanwhile, Michael starts feeling pain in his stomach.

questions.text: Why is Michael having pain in his stomach?
questions.explanation:
His appendix is inflamed.

	While beginning to teach George Michael how to drive, he begins to have intense pain again and drives to the hospital.  When he's there, the family shows up and offers to help him in any way.  Tobias offers to help at the company (although he's really being a mole for George Sr.), and Lindsay offers to help George Michael with driving lessons.

questions.text: What TV show was advertised on Tony Wonder's website?
questions.explanation:
Family Guy.

	Gob asks Buster for help with the magic show so that his Sword of Destiny trick would be good to put on a DVD like Tony Wonder does.  Tony Wonder (played by Ben Stiller) is a magician who once baked himself into a bread loaf, made a sandwich of himself and popped out for the army.  His website was unpopular because of the "Family Guy" ads that distracted people on it.

questions.text: What kind of cookie does Tony Wonder magically pull out of his eye?
questions.explanation:
Hanukkah.

	When Gob and Buster go to the Gothic Castle for their act, they are told that they are opening for Tony Wonder.  Tony shows them a few tricks involving bread and a small cookie before heading off.  Meanwhile, George Sr. tells Tobias to play the tape for the Bluth Company since Michael's in the hospital.

questions.text: After their act, what does Tony Wonder give to Buster and Gob?
questions.explanation:
A Subway sub card.

	During their act, Gob accidentally cuts off Buster's fake hand and they assume it's all magic when he sticks his hand back on.  Tony Wonder decides to use them for his new DVD and gives them a Subway sub card (which still needs three stamps).  After the airing of this episode, the sub card was discontinued.

questions.text: Lindsay teaches George Michael how to drive.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Lindsay goes against Michael and teaches his son how to drive.  During the lesson, George Michael needs to hit the brakes half a mile before they come to an intersection because of the stairs they're carrying.  When they arrive at the hospital after Michael's appendectomy, Lindsay gets the stairs caught under the ER overhang.

questions.text: How long did Tony wait inside a dumbwaiter before appearing for Gob and his assistant?
questions.explanation:
Twenty minutes.

	After waiting for Tony to meet them at the Gothic Castle, Buster and Gob sit around and say that they wonder where he is.  Tony then emerges because one of them said the word 'wonder'.  He had been hiding in a dumbwaiter for twenty minutes before one of them even said the word 'wonder'.

questions.text: The company is fine when Michael gets out of the hospital.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When Lucille tells Michael that everyone thinks that George Sr. is in Iraq, he heads to the office and finds that everything is gone.  When the elevator heads downstairs, it opens and he's told that Ted's idea to move the office down a floor was a success, and the company can get by without making the extra houses.  Meanwhile, Gob and Buster do the Sword of Destiny trick, and Buster accidentally cuts off Gob's fingers.  Back at the hospital, his two fingers are reattached, but they've been switched around.
